item.title: [317]edit quest names[317]
item.dc:creator: @Noob.Coder Noob.Coder
item.description:
@Noob.Coder wrote:

simply go to your texthandler and hit ctrl+f and type in for example “Romeo & Juliet” and delete it and change it to what you want

this shud work i think.
